title: Controlled Surrender
description: Laina is a plus size werewolf in a supernatural world of physical perfection. No one has accepted her for who she is, herself included. She’s an embarrassment to them all, which is why she refuses to mate.Four years ago, Jayson took over his uncle’s pack and found his mate. Too bad she has rejected him at every turn. It’s only when Laina comes to him for help and he forces her to face the truth that his own revelations come.Will this dominant alpha convince his mate to surrender to him? Possibly some cuffs and spankings will sway her…
author: Christin Lovell
